Sentencas: A challenge in the operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with hydrocarbon fuels is the carbon deposition on the nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) anode.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The Grabke-type kinetic model has been proposed for the carbon formation based upon the assumption of elementary steps, which consist of a rate-limiting dissociative chemisorption step and a stepwise dehydrogenation of the chemisorbed methyl group.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs

Sentencas: This work experimentally studied the carbon formation on a SOFC Ni/YSZ anode exposed to CH4+H-2 gas mixtures.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs

Sentencas: Experiments were conducted with various gas compositions of CH4/H-2 and temperatures in the range from 873K to 1,123 K.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The experimental results were used to determine a kinetic model that was applied to the SOFC operating environments.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs

Sentencas: Based on the experimental data, the formula for the carbon formation rate that is dependent on the operating temperature and the gas compositions of CH4/H-2 was established.
Titulo: Experimental Study of the Carbon Deposition from CH4 onto the Ni/YSZ Anode of SOFCs
